text: whw aladhi kff 'aydi almushrikin eankuma, wa'aydiakum eanhum bibatn "mkatan" min baed ma qadartm ealayhim, fasaruu taht sultanikum (whula' almushrikun hum aladhin kharajuu ealaa easkar rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam ba"alhadaybita", fa'amsakahum almuslimun thuma tarkuhum walam yaqtuluhuma, wakanuu nahw thamanin rajalana) wakan allah bi'aemalikum bsyrana, la takhfaa ealayh khafiatan
